thread.title: Goodbye food stamps, hello Blue Apron?

title: Goodbye food stamps, hello Blue Apron?
text:
Goodbye food stamps, hello Blue Apron? 9:50pm IST - 00:36 
Under President Trump's proposed budget, OMB Director Mick Mulvaney says the White House wants to overhaul the food stamp program with a Blue Apron style meal kit service. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Under President Trump's proposed budget, OMB Director Mick Mulvaney says the White House wants to overhaul the food stamp program with a Blue Apron style meal kit service.
